name: @gr4vy-ct/notification
description: Notification package for Commerce tools and Gr4vy

scripts.build: npm link @gr4vy-ct/common && npm run build-common && tsc
scripts.zip-lambda-function: npm run build && cp ./.build/index.lambda.js ./.build/index.js && npm run zip-module && mv gr4vy-notification.zip aws-gr4vy-notification.zip
scripts.zip-google-function: npm run build && cp ./.build/index.googleFunction.js ./.build/index.js && npm run zip-module && mv gr4vy-notification.zip gcp-gr4vy-notification.zip
scripts.zip-module: mkdir gr4vy-notification && cp -r ./.build/* ./gr4vy-notification && cp -rf ./node_modules ./gr4vy-notification/ && rm ./gr4vy-notification/node_modules/@gr4vy-ct/common && mkdir ./gr4vy-notification/node_modules/@gr4vy-ct/common && cp -r ./node_modules/@gr4vy-ct/common/.build/* ./gr4vy-notification/node_modules/@gr4vy-ct/common/ && zip -r gr4vy-notification.zip ./gr4vy-notification && rm -rf gr4vy-notification
